languages.text: "Должна ли? А если я стану такой же, как он — бездушной куклой, безразличной ко всем на свете? Лорд-капитан... мне кажется, мне просто пора смириться. Ничто меня не спасет и... это нормально. Мне страшно, дико страшно, но я без всяких шепотков чувствую, что правильно было бы просто разбить эту штуку и перестать гоняться за фантомами".

traits.locale_text: "Должна ли? А если я стану такой же как он — бездушной куклой, безразличной ко всем на свете? Лорд-капитан... Мне кажется мне просто пора смириться. Ничто меня не спасет и... это нормально. Мне страшно, дико страшно, но я без всяких шепотков чувствую, что правильно было бы просто разбить эту штуку и перестать гоняться за фантомами".

languages.text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."
languages.original_text: "Должна ли? А если я стану такой же, как он — бездушной куклой, безразличной ко всем на свете? Лорд-капитан... мне кажется, мне просто пора смириться. Ничто меня не спасет и... это нормально. Мне страшно, дико страшно, но я без всяких шепотков чувствую, что правильно было бы просто разбить эту штуку и перестать гоняться за фантомами".

traits.locale_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless doll that won't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's normal. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

Nothing can save me, and that's... that's normal. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

"{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_NoTrust}Must I?{/d} What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

languages.text: “必须活下来？如果我也变得像他一样，变成了没有灵魂的傀儡，再也不在乎任何人、任何事情，该怎么办？舰长大人……我觉得，是时候接受这个事实了。没有任何东西能让我活下来，不过，这……这不要紧。我很害怕，我真的吓坏了，但哪怕不听那些低语的建议，我也明白必须摧毁这个东西，不该再追逐不切实际的梦想了。”
languages.original_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

traits.locale_text: “必须活下来？如果我也变得像他一样，变成了没有灵魂的傀儡，再也不在乎任何人、任何事情，该怎么办？舰长大人……我觉得，是时候接受这个事实了。没有任何东西能让我活下来，不过，这……这不要紧。我很害怕，我真的吓坏了，但哪怕不听那些低语的建议，我也明白必须摧毁这个东西，不该再追逐不切实际的梦想了。”
“{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_NoTrust}必须{/d}活下来？如果我也变得像他一样，变成了没有灵魂的傀儡，再也不在乎任何人、任何事情，该怎么办？舰长大人……我觉得，是时候接受这个事实了。没有任何东西能让我活下来，不过，这……这不要紧。我很害怕，我真的吓坏了，但哪怕不听那些低语的建议，我也明白必须摧毁这个东西，不该再追逐不切实际的梦想了。”

languages.text: «¿Debo hacerlo? ¿Y si acabo como él, una marioneta desalmada a la que ya no le importa nada ni nadie? Lord Capitán... creo que es hora de que lo acepte. No existe ninguna salvación para mí, y... y no pasa nada. Tengo miedo, estoy aterrada, pero no necesito ningún susurro para entender que lo correcto es romper esta cosa y dejar de perseguir ilusiones vanas».
languages.original_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

traits.locale_text: «¿Debo hacerlo? ¿Y si acabo como él, una marioneta desalmada a la que ya no le importa nada ni nadie? Lord Capitán... creo que es hora de que lo acepte. No existe ninguna salvación para mí, y... y no pasa nada. Tengo miedo, estoy aterrada, pero no necesito ningún susurro para entender que lo correcto es romper esta cosa y dejar de perseguir ilusiones vanas».

languages.text: "Muss ich? Und wenn ich wie er werde, eine seelenlose Marionette, die sich um nichts und niemanden mehr schert? Lord Captain ... Ich glaube, es ist an der Zeit, dass ich es annehme. Nichts kann mich retten, und das ist ... das ist okay. Ich habe Angst, fürchterliche Angst, aber ich brauche kein Geflüster, um zu verstehen, was das Richtige ist: Dieses Ding zu zerstören und aufzuhören, Phantomen nachzujagen."
languages.original_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

traits.locale_text: "Muss ich? Und wenn ich wie er werde, eine seelenlose Marionette, die sich um nichts und niemanden mehr schert? Lord Captain ... Ich glaube, es ist an der Zeit, dass ich es annehme. Nichts kann mich retten, und das ist ... das ist okay. Ich habe Angst, fürchterliche Angst, aber ich brauche kein Geflüster, um zu verstehen, was das Richtige ist: Dieses Ding zu zerstören und aufzuhören, Phantomen nachzujagen."

languages.text: 「そうしなきゃなの？もしもあたいがあいつのように、何も誰も顧みない、魂のない操り人形になってしまったら？ロード・キャプテン…受け入れる時が来たんだと思う。誰もあたいを救えない。でも…それでいいの。確かに怖くて怖くてたまらない。だけど、囁かれるまでもなく、これを壊して幻を追うのをやめるのが正しいとわかったわ」
languages.original_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

traits.locale_text: 「そうしなきゃなの？もしもあたいがあいつのように、何も誰も顧みない、魂のない操り人形になってしまったら？ロード・キャプテン…受け入れる時が来たんだと思う。誰もあたいを救えない。でも…それでいいの。確かに怖くて怖くてたまらない。だけど、囁かれるまでもなく、これを壊して幻を追うのをやめるのが正しいとわかったわ」
「{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_NoTrust}そうすべきなの？{/d}もし私が彼のように、何も誰も顧みない、魂のない操り人形になってしまったら？ロード・キャプテン…もう受け入れる時だと思うわ。誰も私を救えない。でも…それでいいのよ。確かに怖くて怖くてたまらない。でも、ささやかれるまでもなく、これを壊して幻を追うのをやめるのが正しいとわかったわ」

languages.text: « Le faut-il vraiment ? Et si je devenais comme lui, une marionnette sans âme qui se contrefiche de tout et de tout le monde ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Je pense qu'il est temps pour moi de l'accepter. Rien ne peut me sauver et... ce n'est pas grave. J'ai peur, je suis même terrifiée, mais je n'ai pas besoin de murmures pour comprendre qu'il faut détruire cette chose et cesser de poursuivre des chimères. »
languages.original_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

traits.locale_text: « Le faut-il vraiment ? Et si je devenais comme lui, une marionnette sans âme qui se contrefiche de tout et de tout le monde ? Seigneure-capitaine... Je pense qu'il est temps pour moi de l'accepter. Rien ne peut me sauver et... ce n'est pas grave. J'ai peur, je suis même terrifiée, mais je n'ai pas besoin de murmures pour comprendre qu'il faut détruire cette chose et cesser de poursuivre des chimères. »

« {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_NoTrust}Le faut-il vraiment ?{/d} Et si je devenais comme lui, une marionnette sans âme qui se contrefiche de tout et de tout le monde ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Je pense qu'il est temps pour moi de l'accepter. Rien ne peut me sauver et... ce n'est pas grave. J'ai peur, je suis même terrifiée, mais je n'ai pas besoin de murmures pour comprendre qu'il faut détruire cette chose et cesser de poursuivre des chimères. »

languages.text: "Öyle mi diyorsun? Ya onun gibi kimseyi ve hiçbir şeyi umursamayan ruhsuz bir kukla olursam? Lord Kaptan... Sanırım artık kabullenme vaktim geldi. Beni hiçbir şey kurtaramaz, bu da gayet normal. Korkuyorum, çok korkuyorum ama yapmam gerekenin bu şeyi kırıp hayaletleri kovalamaktan vazgeçmek olduğunu anlamak için fısıltılara ihtiyacım yok."
languages.original_text: "Must I? What if I become like him, a soulless puppet that doesn't care about anything or anybody anymore? Lord Captain... I think it's time I accepted it. Nothing can save me, and that's... that's okay. I'm scared, I'm absolutely terrified, but I don't need any whispers to understand that the right thing to do is to break this thing and stop chasing phantoms."

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_NoTrust}Öyle mi diyorsun?{/d} Ya onun gibi kimseyi ve hiçbir şeyi umursamayan ruhsuz bir kukla olursam? Lord Kaptan... Sanırım artık kabullenme vaktim geldi. Beni hiçbir şey kurtaramaz ve bunda bir sorun yok. Korkuyorum, çok korkuyorum ama yapmam gerekenin bu şeyi kırıp hayaletleri kovalamaktan vazgeçmek olduğunu anlamak için fısıltılara ihtiyacım yok."
